publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1575# Roseanna Cunningham: Tayside Acute Services Review Consultation—That the Parliament expresses its lack of faith in the consultation process associated with the Tayside Acute Services Review and the way in which public opinion is being ignored; is concerned that Tayside Health Board are intent on imposing a centralising agenda which will remove services from Angus and Perthshire and overload the service in Dundee, and believes that the Health and Community Care Committee should undertake an inquiry into the evidence base for the proposals and the effectiveness of the consultation process undertaken. Supported by: Mr John Swinney*, Bruce Crawford*, Michael Matheson*, Fiona McLeod*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Alex Salmond*, Andrew Wilson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Ms Sandra White*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Christine Grahame*, Tricia Marwick*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-1575# Tayside Acute Services Review Consultation (lodged on 22 January 2001) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Shona Robison*
S1M-1575# Tayside Acute Services Review Consultation (lodged on 22 January 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Tommy Sheridan*, Richard Lochhead*

S1M-1575# Roseanna Cunningham: Tayside Acute Services Review Consultation—That the Parliament expresses its lack of faith in the consultation process associated with the Tayside Acute Services Review and the way in which public opinion is being ignored; is concerned that Tayside Health Board are intent on imposing a centralising agenda which will remove services from Angus and Perthshire and overload the service in Dundee, and believes that the Health and Community Care Committee should undertake an inquiry into the evidence base for the proposals and the effectiveness of the consultation process undertaken. Supported by: Mr John Swinney, Bruce Crawford, Michael Matheson, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Alex Salmond, Andrew Wilson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Ms Sandra White, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Christine Grahame, Tricia Marwick, Fiona Hyslop, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Shona Robison, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Andrew Welsh, Tommy Sheridan, Richard Lochhead
S1M-1575# Tayside Acute Services Review Consultation (lodged on 22 January 2001) Fergus Ewing*
S1M-1575# Tayside Acute Services Review Consultation (lodged on 22 January 2001) Irene McGugan*, Michael Russell*
S1M-1575# Tayside Acute Services Review Consultation (lodged on 22 January 2001) Alex Neil*, Brian Adam*
